findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The smart contract may allow an unauthorized user to upgrade the script, potentially leading to malicious code execution.

findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The contract allows minting of an unlimited number of tokens without any restriction.

findings.title: Unprotected initializer
findings.description: The initializer functions are not protected, allowing anyone to call them and potentially causing unintended behavior.

findings.title: Unprotected transfer function
findings.description: The transfer function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized access and potential manipulation of token balances.

findings.title: Unprotected approve function
findings.description: The approve function does not have any protection mechanism, allowing unauthorized access and potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected transferFrom function
findings.description: The transferFrom function is unprotected and can be exploited by malicious users.

findings.title: Unprotected increaseAllowance function
findings.description: The increaseAllowance function does not have any protection or access control, allowing unauthorized users to increase allowance.

findings.title: Unprotected decreaseAllowance function
findings.description: The decreaseAllowance function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected _transfer function
findings.description: The transfer function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized access and potential manipulation of token balances.

findings.title: Unprotected _mint function
findings.description: The owner can mint tokens after launch.

findings.title: Unprotected _burn function
findings.description: The _burn function is not protected and can be accessed by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized burning of tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected _approve function
findings.description: The _approve function is unprotected and can be accessed internally without restrictions.

findings.title: Unprotected _beforeTokenTransfer function
findings.description: The internal function _beforeTokenTransfer is unprotected and can be accessed by anyone.

findings.title: Unprotected startSwapFunctionality function
findings.description: The startSwapFunctionality function is public and lacks access control, allowing anyone to call it.

findings.title: Unprotected deliver function
findings.description: The 'deliver' function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected excludeAccount function
findings.description: The excludeFromFee function can be called by anyone due to lack of access control, allowing unauthorized users to manipulate fee settings.

findings.title: Unprotected includeAccount function
findings.description: The includeAccount function does not have any access control or validation, allowing unauthorized users to manipulate the account state.

findings.title: Unprotected swapAndLiquify function
findings.description: The swapAndLiquify function is unprotected and can be accessed by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized swaps and liquidity additions.

findings.title: Unprotected swapTokensForEth function
findings.description: The swapTokensForEth function is unprotected and can be exploited by malicious actors.

findings.title: Unprotected addLiquidity function
findings.description: The addLiquidity function is unprotected and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unprotected _transferStandard function
findings.description: The _transferStandard function lacks protection, potentially allowing unauthorized access or manipulation.

findings.title: Unprotected _transferToExcluded function
findings.description: The _transferToExcluded function lacks protection, potentially allowing unauthorized access or manipulation.

findings.title: Unprotected _transferFromExcluded function
findings.description: The _transferFromExcluded function lacks protection, potentially allowing unauthorized access or manipulation.

findings.title: Unprotected _transferBothExcluded function
findings.description: The _transferBothExcluded function is unprotected and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unprotected setSwapAndLiquifyEnabled function
findings.description: The setSwapAndLiquifyEnabled function is unprotected and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized changes to the contract's state.

findings.title: Unprotected _reflectFee function
findings.description: The _reflectFee function is unprotected and can be exploited by attackers.

findings.title: Unprotected _reflectBurn function
findings.description: The _reflectBurn function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected _takeLiquidity function
findings.description: The private function _takeLiquidity lacks access control, potentially allowing unauthorized users to manipulate liquidity.
